title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta and garlic in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pancetta pan.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.
